meanings.sent1: The attainability of the prize motivated him to work harder.
meanings.sent2: She believed in the attainability of her dreams.
meanings.sent3: The attainability of finding a unicorn made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: His determination made the attainability of success seem closer.
meanings.sent5: The attainability of the treasure chest sparkled in his mind.

meanings.definition: The state of being able to be achieved or reached.
meanings.sent1: The team discussed the attainability of their project goals.
meanings.sent2: They questioned the attainability of the summit in such harsh weather.
meanings.sent3: The attainability of a chocolate mountain sounded delicious.
meanings.sent4: The attainability of the finish line motivated the runners.
meanings.sent5: The attainability of the stars seemed within reach on that clear night.
